sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`########`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`! CHECK THE READ ME BEFORE ANYTHING ELSE`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"1-install-bower"}}>{`1. Install Bower`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`bower install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"2-install-node-dependencies"}}>{`2. Install Node Dependencies`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`npm install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"3-install-composer-dependencies"}}>{`3. Install Composer Dependencies`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`composer install	// if others needed, check and manually move into folder in wp-content`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"4-copy-across-wordpress-files"}}>{`4. Copy Across WordPress Files`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Locate the folder in finder, copy the files and paste them at the root of the project`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"5-set-mamp-to-the-correct-folder"}}>{`5. Set MAMP to the correct folder`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Create the Database in Sequel Pro`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"6-create-database"}}>{`6. Create Database`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Create the Database in Sequel Pro`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"7-open-the-localhost-and-begin-the-wp-set-up"}}>{`7. Open the Localhost and begin the WP set up`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`! Ensure that the database is created in Sequel Pro`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Set the database field to the database name
Set username and password to what is set for MAMP
Run the Install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"8-open-the-localhost-and-begin-the-wp-set-up"}}>{`8. Open the Localhost and begin the WP set up`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"9-ensure-that-any-other-filesplugins-required-in-the-correct-folder-in-reference-to-3"}}>{`9. Ensure that any other files/plugins required in the correct folder (in reference to 3)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"10-gulp-watch---ensure-that-the-gulpfilejs-is-all-sweet"}}>{`10. gulp watch - ensure that the gulpfile.js is all sweet!`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"11-ensure-the-correct-plugins-are-active"}}>{`11. Ensure the correct plugins are active`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"12-active-the-appropriate-theme"}}>{`12. Active the appropriate theme`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`// `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="strong"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="strong">{`*`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`OTHER FILES`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`/+++++++++++++++++/`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`acf-json files`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`used to create the custom fields in WP admin!`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`/+++++++++++++++++/`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`CPT-UI (custom post types)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`CPT UI controls the post types themselves.
Can be used to import the data.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`this will create the acf-json files`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`// `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="strong"><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="strong">{`*`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`TROUBLESHOOTING`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`/+++++++++++++++++/`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`!ISSUE - check the correct plugins are installed.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Steps:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Check the wp_options under the Content tab
Alter the template and stylesheet to work with an earlier version`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`/+++++++++++++++++/`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`!ISSUE - admin password/database not showing`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Steps:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Ensure the database has been set up
Ensure gulp watch has compiled the file
Ensure that the wp_config file is correctly set up for the wordpress admin stuff`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
